explains: n. 驳船，平底载货船；华丽大游艇；（旗舰将官的）专用艇
v. 用驳船运载（货物）；猛闯；（主要用于体育运动，尤指蓄意）冲撞
wordGroup: barge in v. 闯入；干涉
barge pole n. 驳船撑竿

sentences.en: Raw materials were carried to the works by barge.
sentences.cn: 原材料由驳船运到工厂。

sentences.en: She wants to cruise the canals of France in a barge.
sentences.cn: 她想坐驳船游览法国的运河。

sentences.en: A barge was close inshore about a hundred yards away.
sentences.cn: 一艘驳船靠近海岸仅约100码远。
